# [Interview #1125: Changing Hands, AZ, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1125#28)

#### the\_archduke

Do you mind if people ask you all these fiddly Cosmere questions?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He doesn't mind but warned that sometimes he gets obscure things wrong.
